job_title: German Tax Seniors, Managers & Senior Managers - Across the US (Sponsorship available)
job_description:
An exciting opportunity for German tax advisors to move to the US. We're working with a global firm who are looking to build their German desks across the US. They are looking for individuals with strong experience in German Tax compliance as well as a variety of German Tax advisory services (M&A / International / TP).

To qualify for this opportunity you must have a valid German passport and you will also need to be preparing to take the Stb or have already taken the Stb and passed to become a Manager and beyond.

This is a unique opportunity for German nationals to relocate to the US with visa sponsorship.

Please contact me on View email address on etaxjobs.com for more information.

Qualifications: They are looking for individuals with strong experience in German Tax compliance as well as a variety of German Tax advisory services (M&A / International / TP)
To qualify for this opportunity you must have a valid German passport and you will also need to be preparing to take the Stb or have already taken the Stb and passed to become a Manager and beyond
